section.name: Astroscope
section.p: Astroscope is a search aggregator that, given an RA,Dec position, can query multiple Catalog (Cone), Image (SIAP), Spectra (SSAP). and Time Series/VOEvent (STAP) services. It is either launched from a selection of services in VOExplorer, or is run in 'All-VO' mode, where it will perform an exhaustive search of all suitable known services.

section.name: Helioscope
section.p: Helioscope is a specialized form of Astroscope tailored to query heliospheric datasets for data in a time range specified by the user. It queries a pre-specified set of solar data services.
